modName: LOTR Arnor Numenor Helmet Replacement and Standalone
summary:
Arnor helmet worn by the Numenorean infantry in the War of The Last Alliance of Men and Elves.

This mod is a blades helmet replacement.
descriptionHtml:
Arnor Helmet 1.1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is a Standalone Craftable Arnor Armor
The following mod that you are about to install contains all the required files to wear a numenor helmet.
The file contains helmet for Male/Female/Khajit/Argonian
Some Issues do occur on the Argonian and Khajit version of the helmet.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instalation Instructions:

1.) Download the nexus mod manager for skyrim.

2.) Add the file to the nexus mod manager.

3.) Activate the file.

4.) Enjoy the mod.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Aquisition:

You Can get the armor ingame via Forge

Go to the Forge and find the helmet under steel

Collect the needed materials, go to the forge and presto: Arnor Helmet
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Arnor Helmet 1.1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is a replacement for Bladeshelmet file!!!
The following mod that you are about to install contains all the required files to wear a numenor helmet.
The file contains helmet for Male/Female/Khajit/Argonian
Some Issues do occur on the Argonian and Khajit version of the helmet.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instalation Instructions:

1.) Download the nexus mod manager for skyrim.

2.) Add the file to the nexus mod manager.

3.) Activate the file.

4.) Enjoy the mod.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Aquisition:

You Can get the armor ingame via Blades Helmet

or open console coman in game menu by pressing "`"

And typing in "player.additem 0004B28F 1" without " ".

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Legal Credits & special Thanks:

Mesh & Textures are edited versions originaly from Lord of the Rings: Conquest.

Special Thanks to Nightasy Tutorials and LeckerHamster for the great step by step guides on modeling and getting the object into the game!!!

Hope everyone will enjoy this mod.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tools Used:

Nifscope
WinRar
Mudbox
Photoshop
3DS Max
Cinema 4D


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Legal Extra:

All users feel free to make change and alter the file/Use meshes/object to progress this awesome helmet even further as long as credit is given to the Lord of the Rings: Conquest and the skyrim mod creator Arbiter225.
author: Arbiter225
